scripts.test:e2e: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npx playwright test --headed"
scripts.test:admin: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npx playwright test tests/specs/adminFlow.spec.ts --headed"
scripts.test:user: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npx playwright test tests/specs/userFlow.spec.ts --headed && npx playwright show-report"
scripts.test:fullflow: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npx playwright test tests/specs/userFlow.spec.ts tests/specs/adminFlow.spec.ts --headed && npx playwright show-report"
scripts.test:report: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npx playwright test --reporter=html --headed && npx playwright show-report"
